pullrequest.title: Set robot descriptions when spawning robots

content.raw:
hmm, I was under the impression that it wasn't. Right now sensor topics are hardcoded to use X1-X4 in the sdf files for each vehicle. We'll have to change all the vehicle files to use default topic names so they pick up the model name at runtime. I just tried running the example command and the topic list in ign-transport has
```
/model/X2/front/camera_info
/model/X2/front/image_raw
/model/X2/front_scan
/model/X2/imu/data
```

and both vehicles are publishing to same topics.
content.html:
hmm, I was under the impression that it wasn't. Right now sensor topics are hardcoded to use X1-X4 in the sdf files for each vehicle. We'll have to change all the vehicle files to use default topic names so they pick up the model name at runtime. I just tried running the example command and the topic list in ign-transport has

/model/X2/front/camera_info
/model/X2/front/image_raw
/model/X2/front_scan
/model/X2/imu/data

and both vehicles are publishing to same topics.
